mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mishu_write.tb_vip_rights_changes( v_rights_id, v_id, v_fee_std_id, rights_num, mod_type, increase_days, his_expired_date, reason, created, create_by) values( #{vRightsId}, #{vId}, #{vFeeStdId}, #{rightsNum}, #{modType}, #{increaseDays}, #{hisExpiredDate}, #{reason}, #{created}, #{createBy})
